entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind south 20 km/h becoming west 20 near noon. High 7. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023
